name: Design Discord
description:
I recommend refreshing the page often as there is a lot of bugs, I plan on fixing the major ones this week!!FLASHING LIGHTS WARNING!!

The game is currently very buggy and is a work in progress, uploaded for now in time for Art Fight, will be polishing up and fixing bugs so stay tuned

CONTROLS: 

CHARACTER SELECT

Arrow Keys for navigation

Return key for confirm

GAME

Left and Right Arrow Keys for movement, Up and Down for aiming

Space for Jump

Z for attack, X for special, Left Shift for dash
